Implement SVG-based fishbowl rendering with proper design

- Prominent golden rim at top matching Freepik reference design
- Circular left/right sides with flat bottom base
- Implemented circular collision detection (Tank.ts)
- Fish bounce off curved walls with velocity reflection
- All tests passing (6 integration, 3 E2E)
- Zero linting errors
